ChooseStorageSizeSection.title: Data leaks can lead to job loss, legal troubles, and blackmailing
ChooseStorageSizeSection.description: Our cloud storage keeps your files safe, even if your device gets stolen or hacked.
ChooseStorageSizeSection.peaceOfMind: Peace of mind, guaranteed with Internxt.

FirstFeaturesSection.title: Why choose Internxt?
FirstFeaturesSection.subtitle: Internxt puts you back in control of your data with zero-knowledge, military-grade encryption.
FirstFeaturesSection.description: We use open source code, allowing independent verification of our security practices. Internxt empowers you to own your data, offering unparalleled privacy and peace of mind.

InfoSection.title: Secure cloud storage with unmatched privacy
InfoSection.description: What makes Internxt so special? We’re a tight-knit team of professionals completely dedicated to protecting you online. Everything we do and every decision we make is centered on protecting your data from being exploited.

cards.title: Private by design
cards.description: We don’t store passwords or user data and all of your data is encrypted in-transit and at-rest. Internxt puts you in full control of your files. Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.

cards.title: Uncompromising security
cards.description: Your files are end-to-end encrypted before ever leaving your device. Thanks to zero-knowledge AES-256 encryption, you are the absolutely only one with access to your data.

cards.title: Open source and transparent
cards.description: We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

cards.title: Independently verified
cards.description: We’re wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don’t take our word for it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe’s leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

SecondFeaturesSection.title: Secure cloud storage with unmatched privacy
SecondFeaturesSection.description: What makes Internxt so special? We value your privacy and want to protect you against the emerging threats of data breaches. Unlike Big Tech companies like Google Drive, we never monitor, collect, or profit from your data.

info.title: Independently Verified Security
info.description: Your peace of mind is our priority. That's why our services successfully passed a security audit from a leading European pen-testing company, validating that your data and files are secure against hackers.

info.title: Effortless collaboration
info.description: Internxt offers increased control over how you manage your privacy and who can access your files. Safely share, edit, and access files with management permissions and password protection.

info.title: Backup storage on demand
info.description: Save your data from disaster with built-in redundancy. Back up your essential work and projects across multiple fast servers throughout the EU and access them from all your devices.

info.title: Secure and accessible
info.description: Internxt protects your data with cutting-edge encryption, so you can work and access your files from anywhere with complete peace of mind.

ThirdFeaturesSection.title: Get 1GB for free!
ThirdFeaturesSection.description: Create your free account now and get full access to our suite of online privacy services.

card1.title: Built for the future
card1.description: We want to build a better World Wide Web, one that’s fair, safe, and equitable for all. The battle is raging for the future of internet privacy, and we’re at the frontline.

card2.title: All your devices, one seamless experience
card2.description: Internxt is available on all platforms, even Linux! Sync your files and photos with our mobile, web, and desktop apps, each engineered to supercharge your encrypted storage on the go.

card3.title: Try Internxt for free
card3.description: Get 1GB free and see if privacy suits you before going all in!

SecondWhatWeDoSection.title: You are not the product
SecondWhatWeDoSection.description: Internxt offers a growing family of products like Drive, Send, and VPN all built with a focus on user privacy. Trusted by leading brands worldwide, Internxt empowers individuals like you to take control of your data and privacy.

square1.title: Internxt Drive
square1.subtitle: The safest cloud storage for all your files, photos, and more
square1.description: Take back control of your files and data with Internxt Drive. Storing and backing up your files in complete privacy couldn’t be any easier. Modern cloud storage meets military-grade encryption.

square2.title: Internxt Send
square2.subtitle: Encrypt, share, and send large files with absolute certainty
square2.description: Send allows you to end-to-end encrypt and share large files fast without worrying about the security of your documents, images, or videos. Transfer to anyone in total confidentiality.

square3.title: Internxt VPN
square3.subtitle: Secure online photo storage for all your picture-perfect moments
square3.description: Internxt VPN encrypts and secures your internet connection, protecting you from data leaks, hackers, and network attacks. Keep your data private and protected from prying eyes.

faq.question: Can Internxt access my files?
answer: No. Internxt, along with any other third-party, cannot access your files, photos, or data.

Internxt’s services feature zero-knowledge encryption, meaning only you can access and decrypt your private data. Additionally, Internxt uses post-quantum cryptography, the most advanced technology available, to protect your files from future threats.

faq.question: Is Internxt a sustainable and eco-friendly cloud storage solution?
answer: Yes, Internxt is committed to green cloud computing, offering eco-friendly storage solutions to support a cleaner, sustainable future. Our data centers are powered by 92% renewable energy and are designed to minimize carbon emissions, resource consumption, and e-waste.
Our efforts contribute to a climate-neutral goal by 2050. Learn more

faq.question: Does Internxt store my password?
answer: No. As such, Internxt does not (and cannot) store your password.
Your Internxt password is unique to you and used to encrypt and decrypt your Internxt data. But if you want to change your password, you can do so from our app.

faq.question: Can I enable 2FA?
answer: Yes. You can configure two-factor Authentication for your account through the Internxt web app.
You can also use Authy or any other 2FA tools to generate a personal 2FA code with Internxt.

faq.question: How do I create an Internxt account?
answer: To create a free Internxt account, simply click the best plan above and follow the instructions.

Or head to our homepage and click on “Get started.” You will instantly get 1GB of free storage for life with a free Internxt membership. You can use your free membership to access all our services. To sign up, simply enter your name and email address. No identity nor email verification is required to start using Internxt's services.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort and Cryptocurrency.

faq.question: What is Internxt’s refund policy?
answer: Internxt offers a standard 30-day money-back guarantee across all its paid subscriptions, which starts counting as soon as you subscribe.
And if you're ever unsatisfied with our service, reach out to us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) and request a refund.

faq.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
answer: Canceling your subscription is simple. Open the Internxt app, navigate to settings, and select 'Cancel Subscription.' This action will terminate your subscription immediately, and your account will revert to a free plan.

Please note that any remaining time on your current paid subscription will not be refunded or carried over. For instance, if you cancel a one-year plan with four months remaining, you will lose access to those remaining four months.
You can also cancel a paid plan and your Internxt account via settings, which will delete your subscription, account, and all your files.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: Can't find what you're looking for? You can contact our Customer Success team via live chat or by sending an email to [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com).

faq.question: Does Internxt have lifetime plans?
answer: We offer lifetime plans which you can purchase from our website. These grant you lifetime access to our plans, with up to 10TB of storage for a unique, one-time payment.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can add as much storage as you want to your Internxt lifetime membership. Internxt lifetime plans are stackable. Simply purchase them with the same email address and contact us at hello@internxt.com so we can stack them together for you on the same account.

faq.question: Is Internxt a sustainable and eco-friendly cloud storage solution?
answer: Yes, Internxt is committed to green cloud computing, offering eco-friendly storage solutions to support a cleaner, sustainable future. Our data centers are powered by 92% renewable energy and are designed to minimize carbon emissions, resource consumption, and e-waste.
Our efforts contribute to a climate-neutral goal by 2050. [Learn more](https://internxt.com/es/green-cloud-computing)

cards.name: Eva Williams
cards.review: Internxt is a convenient cloud storage service for privacy-conscious clients. It has a streamlined interface and a reliable support team, which makes it a great option for those who need to store their files securely.

cards.name: Cristian M.
cards.review: The best encrypted Dropbox alternative. Overall: We needed an alternative that allowed us to store client files and work (social media files) and as Internxt is GDPR friendly fit perfectly for us!

cards.name: Josep Carrizo
cards.review: I've been using Google Drive for several years, but I needed an alternative which granted me the privacy of my data. Something that Google or other well known platforms can't do. That's why I moved to Internxt.
